__e: I don't want anyone thinking it's okay what happened to us, especially not that hospital.
I didn't do any of the things you think I did... especially not the thing I think you're cleaning up right now.
ESPECIALLY WHEN THE PERSON YOU'RE REALLY ANGRY AT... IS ME.
I mean, I'll pay special attention if somebody gives me something, or says something to me, especially if they do it with their hand on a doorknob...
Especially if it's a person who dies, and it's someone you love very, very much, like your daddy.
Especially to yours as you've been tired lately.
I was just hurt to learn that you would lower yourself to this distraction and particularly when she constitutes a rather fiendish lie.

I know that this is a difficult thing to hear... as you're pulling yourselves together... to go and do a performance. And my thoughts are with you especially... 'cause I know he was a big part for us [ Man ] He certainly was.
Particularly because, if you can't say it at Christmas when can you, eh, I'm actually yours.
But I also know that you're a fair person, and I hope that you'll do me the favor of listening, especially since I really do have some very good news for you.
Look. These three girls, especially her.
I ask you to keep watching over us especially those members of our family who aren't with us today.

That's all that matters... especially to you, I'm gathering.
Tom, you know that we appreciate-- I appreciate everything that you have done for us.
I'm sorry it turned out this way, for both of us and certainly for them.
